summary: This document is a wire transfer request involving Richard Kahn and Charles Schwab & Co., Inc. It details the process for verifying a foreign wire transfer request, including necessary information and instructions for completing the transaction. The document highlights the importance of accuracy in providing account details to avoid delays or losses.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is identified as the account holder requesting a foreign wire transfer from his Schwab account.

events.title: Outbound Wire Request
events.description: A request for an outbound wire transfer of 14,950,000 USD was initiated.

keyFacts: Richard Kahn is the account holder requesting a foreign wire transfer.
The wire transfer amount is 14,950,000 USD.
The request was initiated on July 5, 2019.
The document outlines the verification process for wire transfers.
Accuracy in providing account details is emphasized to avoid potential losses.
